Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with oxacillin
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of Gram-positive enterococci and staphylococci
Methodologies: Quantitative and qualitative antimicrobial susceptibility testing
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with oxacillin for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Gram-positive staphylococci and enterococci.
Indications for Use Summary: Determines quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic Gram-positive enterococci and staphylococci using oxacillin in various MIC/breakpoint sequences.
